text: Hagi Israeli vahe'mo'za Ra Anumzamofo tra kema, zamafahe'inema huhagerafi huvempa kema hu'nea ke'ne, mago'a koro ke'ma huzmante'nea kegura zamefi humi'naze. Hagi havi anumzana amnezante monora ome hunente'za, zamagranena amne'za se'naze. Hagi kora Ra Anumzamo'a Israeli vahera zamasamino, ru kumate vahe'mo'zama hanaza zamavu'zama zana zamavaririta osiho huno zamasami'ne. Hianagi Ra Anumzamofo kea rutagre'za ana havi zamavu'zmavazana hu'naze.
